name: Tethgeter
description:
Defend the kingdom from the evil warlock's mind-controlled hordes. Don't let them blow up the gate!

Place towers, campfires, and ice blocks, and tether them together to combine their powers for maximum defense of the kingdom.

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Click - Place Tower

Right Click - Tether towers (first click sets first target, second sets end target)

Note: Right-clicking a currently tethered tower will remove the tether and be put back into your available tethers

1 2 3 - Select Tower

4 - Purchase Additional Tether
